author: paras@getbindu.com
name: shopping-partner-agent
description: Shopping Partner Agent is an AI-powered personal shopping assistant that helps users discover, compare, and choose products based on preferences, budget, and needs. It analyzes reviews, features, pricing, and alternatives to provide smart recommendations—making shopping faster, more informed, and hassle-free.

environment_variables.description: OpenRouter API key for LLM calls
Exa API key for search operations
Mem0 API key for memory operations
